product_name: IT CosmeticsTravel Size Confidence in a Cleanser Gentle Face Wash
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganGive BackIT Cosmetics Confidence in a Cleanser Gentle Face Wash is a sulfate-free and soap-free gentle face cleanser and serum that hydrates while cleansing skin in one step.
details: DetailsBenefitsDaily face cleanser that nourishes and moisturizes skin while dissolving oil, dirt and makeup (even waterproof makeup!)Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin and dry skinOphthalmologist-tested for use around the delicate eye areaDeveloped with plastic surgeons, it cleanses and moisturizes, leaving skin feeling soft, refreshed and balancedSulfate-free, paraben-free, and soap-freeKey IngredientsCollagenHyaluronic acidColloidal oatmealCeramidesResearch Results100% showed improved hydration*100% say skin felt completely clean*89% felt an immediate skin-softening effect*83% say skin looked and felt rejuvenated**Results observed in a clinical studyItem 2525634How To UseGently massage onto wet skin for 30 seconds every morning and evening. Rinse and pat dry. Skin is left feeling soft, nourished and perfectly balanced. Follow with your favorite IT Cosmetics treatment or moisturizer.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Glycerin, Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Chloride, 1,2-Hexanediol, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Arginine Cocoate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Coco-Glucoside, Citric Acid, Hexylene Glycol, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Sinensis Peel Oil Expressed, Butylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Ethylhexylglycerin, Niacinamide, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Water, Colloidal Oatmeal, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Ceramide Np, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ceteareth-20, Glyceryl Citrate/Lactate/Linoleate/Oleate, Hydroxypropyl Bispalmitamide Mea, Glycosphingolipids, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Meadowfoam Estolide, Ceramide Ap, Ethylhexyl Isonanoate, Squalane, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polysorbate 20, Carbomer, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Steareth-20, Chrysin, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Disodium EDTA, Benzoic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, FD&C Yellow No. 5 (CI 19140).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently massage onto wet skin for 30 seconds every morning and evening. Rinse and pat dry. Skin is left feeling soft, nourished and perfectly balanced. Follow with your favorite IT Cosmetics treatment or moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Foamy & Refreshing
reviews.comments: I loved the refreshing foaming action and rinsed cleaned, leaving a very clean feeling! Would recommend especially if you enjoy a foamy action.

reviews.headline: Love this stuff
reviews.comments: I impulse bought the trial set and so glad I did!  The cleanser is the best I've ever used on my 46yo skin. My skin feels clean but not dried out or tight. It works well to remove makeup, with the caveat that I typically do fairly light makeup (tinted moisturizer,  concealer,  eyeshadow, and mascara). The only downside is the weird semi-citrus scent. Luckily it's not too strong and dissipates quickly.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin, will break you out!
reviews.comments: I'm not sure how this cleanser can be marketed as "sensitive" at all. The fragrance is so over powering and it left my face feeling so dry and tight even after using face lotion. This was the only new product I added to my routine and within two days my face and neck were covered in tiny painful whiteheads that took awhile to fully go away. Do not use this product.

reviews.headline: No thank you
reviews.comments: Great job of cleansing snd removing makeup but dried out my skin. Will be returning.

reviews.headline: Favorite face wash besides fresh.
reviews.comments: I love this wash. It's gentle, moisturizing without causing added oiliness, takes off makeup (even mascara), and is gentle enough for sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: Eczema beware
reviews.comments: This has given me the most horrible itchy flaking eczema I have ever had on my face/specifically around my nose. It is not fragrance free like I have read in some reviews(smells like a dreamsicle which is nice albeit strong) I have used other cleansers with some fragrance and have never had this issue. A friend had the same issue with this product and neither of us have what I would consider to be traditional sensitive skin. This was the only new addition to my skincare routine and I do not wear makeup/no change in detergents or other factors to cause a flare up in my skin, and I am still struggling to get the eczema under control and stop spreading.

reviews.headline: Have to double wash
reviews.comments: I love how this doesnt strip skin. unfortunately I always feel I need to wash a second time to get all the makeup off my face. it may just be the moisturizing properties making it feel I still have product on my face, but I like to be sure.

reviews.headline: Great cleanser
reviews.comments: Surprisingly enough I was reading some of the reviews and a couple of women with sensitive skin had a reaction with this cleanser. I have super sensitive skin and decided to try this cleanser and my skin did not react to this product. First of all I lather it with little water and it bubbles and then massages and rinses. This is the only It product that I used! Clarin's is my skincare that I use for almost 20 years. Skincare is not one size fits all and you have to be careful to find the right match for your skin.

reviews.headline: My new holy grail
reviews.comments: I have extremely sensitive, dry, irritated skin. This cleanser is perfect for everyday use. It doesn't smell amazing and it's a bit pricey, but it makes my skin feel incredible and clean. Well worth the money. I will continue to purchase it.

reviews.headline: Dry skin girly
reviews.comments: Would recommend if you dry skin. It is not super stripping

reviews.headline: IT is the absolute best
reviews.comments: It will give your confidence a bug boost! Your fave feels smooth and soft afterwards.. and just a little cleans a whole lot- makeup, oils, dry areas, whatever's not supoosed to be there. You cant go wrong with this cleanser. I swear by it.

reviews.headline: Only cleanser I will use!
reviews.comments: I have been using this cleanser for about 3 years. I have only bought about 3 of them! A little really does go a long way. I love that this is really gentle on my eyes and completely removes my waterproof eyeliner and eye makeup. Its fantastic!

reviews.headline: love this cleanser!
reviews.comments: my mom originally got this cleanser in a set, and i tried it & loved it. a little goes a long way… it leaves my face feeling so smooth and i swear it gets rid of my redness. i would definitely recommend this to anyone wuo struggles with dryness and/or redness!

reviews.headline: love this cleanser!
reviews.comments: my mom originally got this cleanser in a set, and i tried it & loved it. a little goes a long way… it leaves my face feeling so smooth and i swear it gets rid of my redness. i would definitely recommend this to anyone wuo struggles with dryness and/or redness!

reviews.headline: Purchased multiple times.
reviews.comments: Pleased with product.

reviews.headline: Will keep using as long as they make it!
reviews.comments: This cleanser is pricey, no way around that. However, i buy it once every 5-6 months, it lasts a very long time. This moisturizes my skin and is a great daily cleanser. It's great on sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Ick
reviews.comments: I have dry, insanely sensitive skin. This is supposed to be safe for sensitive skin; however, I had a reaction to this. I could feel tingling while I was using it, then when I looked in the mirror, my cheeks were a dark, angry red color.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Sales lady recommended this skincare line.  I have never heard of it before but she spoke so highly, I decided to give it a try - cleanser, day/night moisturizer. This skincare is not for me. It was not hydrating which is what I was looking for.  My face didn't look fresh and hydrated, it had a dull look plus the moisturizer itched my face, and had slight stinging.  It didn't work for me but it may for others.

reviews.headline: I Love this product.
reviews.comments: This is part of my morning routine.  Love the way my face feels. It last along time.

reviews.headline: I DO buy this cleanser again and again!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite facial cleanser. I use this in the shower and have repurchased this many times. It is one of those products I hope I never have to live without.

media.headline: Leaves skin soft not drying
media.caption: My new top and IT Cosmetics CC Cream

media.headline: It made my skin feel super soft & glow beautifully
media.caption: Confidence in a cleanser & myself

media.headline: The only cleanser I'll use!
media.caption: My hands tell my age, but not my face!! IT is all I use.

media.headline: Super cleaner
media.caption: Face feels so pure and clean after using this.

media.headline: Love this product! I would definitely recommend to a friend!
media.caption: After use

media.headline: Smells just like the lotion and CC

faceoff_positive.comments: I love this cleanser. Leave my skin soft and clean. I really recommend this product. I also have the cream which its also my favorite.
faceoff_positive.headline: My favorite

faceoff_negative.comments: I had tried the confidence in a cream in the past and it was terribly drying on my skin so I gave it to my mother who liked it. When the face wash came out I was reluctant to try it however I bought it anyway. It did the same exact thing so sadly I had to return it. The pros, it is fragrance free and has a creamy consistency.  It removed all of my makeup at the end of the day. The cons, my face felt tight and flaky within minutes of washing my face. I had to rush and moisturize! After abt a week, my face started to break out and my skin was looking less than stellar. I realize everyone's results will be different and I love this brand and will continue to use their other products. I know that I need to stay far away from their Confidence line though.
faceoff_negative.headline: Didn't work for me

rollup.name: Travel Size Confidence in a Cleanser Gentle Face Wash
